DASHBOARD.TITLE: Dashboard

MANAGE_USERS.TITLE: Manage users
MANAGE_USERS.SUBTITLE: User list
MANAGE_USERS.DESCRIPTION: This view allows you to find different domain's users. You can change roles, firstname, lastname and default languages, as well as upload permissions
MANAGE_USERS.SEARCH_GUIDE: You should enter an user information (ex: email) in the search field.
MANAGE_USERS.NAVIGATE_GUIDE: Click on the user to access to his profile.
MANAGE_USERS.MULTIPLE_DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this or these users, this procedure is irreversible and destroys all documents. Do you want to continue?

DETAIL_USER.TITLE: Manage user
DETAIL_USER.CONFIRM_DELETE: You are about to delete this user, this procedure is irreversible and destroy all his document. Do you want to proceed?
DETAIL_USER.LOCKED_USER_DESCRIPTION: This user is locked due to failed login attempts
DETAIL_USER.AUTHOR: Author
DETAIL_USER.RESTRICTED_CONTACTS_LIST_REQUIRED: For restricted guest, his restricted contacts list must contain at least one contact
DETAIL_USER.GUEST_EXPIRATION_DATE_VALIDATION_MESSAGE: Guest expiration date must be between tomorrow and {date}

MANUAL_SETUP.STEP_4: 4. Make sure the below inputs are configured as:

MANAGE_SHARED_SPACES.TITLE: Workspaces and Workgroups
MANAGE_SHARED_SPACES.DESCRIPTION: A workgroup is a collaborating space that contains internal or guest users. A workspace contains workgroups with the default member list. A workgroup can be inside a workspace or standalone. This view allows you to manage workspaces, workgroups and their members. LinShare administrators are not allowed to access the workgroup content (files or folders). The uploaded files in a workgroup are owned by the workgroup, not to the user. Therefore, they do not affect the user allowed quota.

MEMBERS.CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to remove this member from shared space?
MEMBERS.FILTER_PLACEHOLDER: Search or filter shared space members
MEMBERS.FORCE_CHECKBOX: Override this role for all nested workgroups
MEMBERS.DEFAULT_ROLE_TAG_TOOLTIP: This role will apply to this member for all newly created workgroup inside this workspace

INCONSISTENT_USERS.TITLE: Inconsistent users
INCONSISTENT_USERS.DESCRIPTION: An inconsistent user is a user who is no longer in any LDAP associated to different domains. This view enables the domain of an inconsistent user so that he become a regular user. Through a user's result, you can edit the information related to him. By selection of a group of users, you can delete them all at one or change their domain

SCRUTINY.TITLE: User diagnostic
SCRUTINY.SEARCH_LEGEND: Find a person's accounts by giving his email address
SCRUTINY.LDAP_HEADER_LABEL: Presence of the user in the LDAP
SCRUTINY.DATABASE_HEADER_LABEL: Presence of the user in the database
SCRUTINY.GUEST_HEADER_LABEL: Whether the user is a guest
SCRUTINY.WARNING_OUT_OF_DATE_REFRESH: The displayed data are no longer uptodate

CONFIRM_DELETE_FORM.PARAGRAPH: You are about to delete this user, this procedure is irreversible and destroy all his document. Do you want to proceed?

QUOTA.USER_MAX_FILE_SIZE: User's max upload file size in Personal Space
QUOTA.ALL_SPACE_ALLOCATED_QUOTA: Allocated quota for all PERSONAL SPACE
QUOTA.CANNOT_EXCEED_ALLOCATED_DOMAIN_QUOTA: Value can not exceed allocated domain quota
QUOTA.ALLOCAED_QUOTA_SPECIFIC_USER_ACCOUNT: Allocate quota a specific user account
QUOTA.QUOTA_EXCEEDED_ERROR: Quota exceeded, free up storage space or allocate more quota for the
QUOTA.QUOTA_AND_USED_INFORMATIONS_ALERT: This section allows you manage the current domain quota size and setup it as on your need.
QUOTA.MAINTENANCE_MODE_ACTIVATED_ALERT: Maintenance mode is activated, thereby preventing any uploads to be made within the current domain.
QUOTA.ERROR_MESSAGE_FIELD: The value should be below or equal to :
QUOTA.QUOTA_IN_DOMAIN_IS_MANAGED_BY_CONTAINERS: Quota in domain is managed by containers. Currently we have 2 containers:
QUOTA.PERSONAL_SPACE_MANAGE_THE_ALLOCATED_SPAC: Personal Space (P.P): Manage the allocated space for all users’s space
QUOTA.SHAREDSPACE_MANAGE_THE_ALLOCATED_SPACE_F: SharedSpace (S.P): Manage the allocated space for all sharedspace (workgroups & workspaces)

ERROR.QUOTA_LESS_THAN_FILE_SIZE: Storage quota must be larger than max file size
ERROR.FILE_SIZE_LARGER_THAN_QUOTA: Max file size must be smaller than storage quota

ROOT_DOMAIN_QUOTA.CURRENT_DOMAIN_USED_SPACE: Current domain used space (Personal + Shared Space)

DOMAIN_SHARED_QUOTA.DESCRIPTION: Activation of this mode exempt from setting each container's quota of this domain (Personal Space and Shared Space). The user will see global consumption of all users of the domain.
DOMAIN_SHARED_QUOTA.LABEL: Activate Domain shared Quota

DELETE.MODAL_CHILD_EXISTS_TEXT: Please remove all nested domains (sub-domains and guest domain) of this domain before deleting
DELETE.MODAL_CONFIRM_TEXT: You are about to delete this domain, this procedure is irreversible and destroy all related data (documents, users, ...). Do you want to proceed?

FIELDS.NAME: Name
FIELDS.NAME_MAX_LENGTH: Domain name must be shorter than 256 characters
FIELDS.NOTIFICATION_LANGUAGE_HELPER: Notification emails will be sent in this language for all newly created users on this domain.
FIELDS.DEFAULT_USER_ROLE_HELPER: This role will be assigned to all newly created users on this domain.

WARNING.PAGE_NOT_ACCESSIBLE: This page is not accessible for current domain or user

CREATE_MODAL.FOOTER_NOTE: The domain will be created with default values, for example default role or locale, etc... After creating domain, please edit the domain and its parameters for more advanced settings
CREATE_MODAL.DOMAIN_POLICY_AUTO_TOOLTIP: If enabled, a rule will be created automatically by authorizing the newly created domain to communicate with itself only. All other communications are forbidden by default. If disabled, the default domain policy will be applied. It will allow all other domains to see this domain.

DOMAIN.REMOTE_FILTERS_HELPER: Remote filters can be used by any domain

FIELDS.PROVIDED_URL_HELPER: Please enter your Twake app base url, f.i https://my.twake.com

REMOTE_SERVER.DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this remote server connection, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?
REMOTE_SERVER.DELETE_ABORT: This connection is associated with at least one of the providers. You cannot delete.
REMOTE_SERVER.NO_ASSOCIATED_DOMAIN: There is no domain using this connection.

BETA.MENU_TITLE: The development of this new interface is in progress, go to the old version for all configuration menus.
BETA.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: This feature is not yet available on this version. Do you want to access the old version to continue?

FORM.SEARCH_USER_QUERY_HELPER: LDAP query to search for users
FORM.AUTOCOMPLETE_QUERY_HELPER: LDAP queries to autocomplete an user using either all attributes or only first name and last name
FORM.ATTRIBUTES_HELPER: A mapping of LinShare user attribute to LDAP directory attribute

LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P1: After creating a connection to a LDAP directory, it is necessary to create an user filter.
LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P2: This pattern will allow you to define the correspondence between attributes of LinShare users and your directory attributes. Furthermore, LinShare requires 4 different queries to work properly.

USER_FILTER.DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this User filter, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?
USER_FILTER.DELETE_ABORT: This user filter is accociated with at least one domain. You cannot delete.

USER_PROVIDER.EMPTY_MESSAGE: There is no user provider created for this domain
USER_PROVIDER.EMPTY_MESSAGE_GUEST_DOMAIN: Creating a Twake guest provider is optional. By creating Twake guest provider, guest users will then be provided by Twake. Users will no longer be able to create guests for this domain.
USER_PROVIDER.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to fetch user provider data of this domain
USER_PROVIDER.DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this user provider, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?

LDAP.BASE_DN_HELPER: LinShare will start looking for users from this position in your LDAP

OIDC.ASSOCIATED_DOMAIN_ID_HELPER: By creating OIDC user provider for {name}, you allow LinShare to create users for this domain when an user authenticates with OIDC. The user will be created in this domain if the value of the claim 'domain_discriminator' matches the value above.
OIDC.USED_DOMAIN_ID: This domain identifier has already been used by another domain
OIDC.CHECK_EXTERNAL_USER_ID_HELPER: LinShare will search for the claim 'external_uid' and will store its value in the user profile upon first connection. Then this stored identifier will be compared with the claim value at each OIDC authentication attempts in order to be sure it is the same user.
OIDC.USE_ROLE_CLAIM_HELPER: LinShare will search for the claim 'linshare_role', its value will be used as default role value when creating the profile at first connection. Possible values: ADMIN, SIMPLE
OIDC.USE_EMAIL_LOCALE_CLAIM_HELPER: LinShare will search for the claim 'linshare_locale', its value will be used as default locale value when creating the profile at first connection. Possible values: ENGLISH, FRENCH, RUSSIAN.
OIDC.USE_ACCESS_CLAIM_HELPER: LinShare will search for the claim 'linshare_access' (presence and value) to grant access to LinShare. The value of the claim must match the value stored in the property file otherwise the user will be rejected

TWAKE.COMPANY_ID_HELPER: LinShare will retrieve users from this company in Twake

GROUP_FILTER.DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this group filter, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?
GROUP_FILTER.DELETE_ABORT: This filter is associated with at least one group provider. You cannot delete.
GROUP_FILTER.NO_ASSOCIATED_DOMAIN: There is no domain using this group filter

LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P1: LinShare support automatical synchronization between LinShare workgroups and LDAP groups. Workgroups and workgroup members are therefore created and synchronized with their LDAP counterpart. By default, members are given reader role.
LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P2: LinShare requires the queries below to synchronize:
LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P3: LQL query (LDAP Query Language) to search all workgroups
LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P4: LQL query to search a workgroup

FORM.PREFIX_HELPER: The prefix text to be stripped form workgroup name
FORM.SEARCH_PAGE_SIZE_ERROR: Page size must be at least 1

GROUP_PROVIDER.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to fetch group provider data of this domain
GROUP_PROVIDER.DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this group provider, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?

LDAP.BASE_DN_HELPER: LinShare will start looking for workgroups from this position in your LDAP

WORKSPACE_FILTER.DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this workspace filter, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?

WORKSPACE_FILTER.NO_ASSOCIATED_DOMAIN: There is no workspace provider using this filter

LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P1: LinShare support automatical synchronization between LinShare workspaces and LDAP workspaces. Workspaces and workspace members are therefore created and synchronized with their LDAP counterpart. By default, members are given reader role.
LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P2: LinShare requires the queries below to synchronize:

LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P4: LQL query to search for a workspace

FORM.WORK_SPACE_SEARCH_HELPER: LDAP queries and parameters to search for all workspaces or a single workspace

FORM.SEARCH_PAGE_SIZE_ERROR: Page size must be at least 1

WORKSPACE_PROVIDER.EMPTY_MESSAGE: There is no workspace provider created for this domain
WORKSPACE_PROVIDER.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to fetch workspace provider data of this domain
WORKSPACE_PROVIDER.DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this workspace provider, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?

LDAP.BASE_DN_HELPER: LinShare will start looking for workspaces from this position in your LDAP

WELCOME_MESSAGES.DESCRIPTION: In this view, you can select one domain in the domain trees and see list of welcome messages that you created or allowed to used
WELCOME_MESSAGES.ROOT_DOMAIN_DESCRIPTION: Root domain can create welcome messages but cannot use any of them
WELCOME_MESSAGES.NESTED_DOMAIN_DESCRIPTION: Nested domain can create welcome messages for its own use and can use welcome messages created by its highter domains
WELCOME_MESSAGES.SET_FIELD: You need to set this field
WELCOME_MESSAGES.DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this welcome message, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?
WELCOME_MESSAGES.MESSAGE_PREVIEW: Here is a preview of the welcome message:
WELCOME_MESSAGES.ASSIGN_CONFIRM: You are about to assign this welcome message to the current domain. Do you want to proceed?

MIME_POLICIES.CREATE_DESCRIPTION: Click one the “Create +” button and give a name to your MIME type filter
MIME_POLICIES.FILTER_DESCRIPTION: Choose the filter that you added then a list of available MIME types is displayed
MIME_POLICIES.ENABLED_DESCRIPTION: Enable or disable the MIME type you want then save
MIME_POLICIES.MANAGE_DESCRIPTION: You can then assign this filter for the domain or its nested domains.

DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_MODAL_SUBTITLE: You are about to delete this Mime policy, this action is irreversible. Do you still want to proceed?
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_MODAL_EMPTY: Please select mime type to delete
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_SINGLE_FAIL: Selected Mime policies is associated with at least one domain. You cannot delete
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_MUTIPLE_MODAL_SUBTITLE: You are about to delete [{qty}] Mime policies, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_FAILURE_MESSAGE: Some of MIME policies are deleted successfully but not others because they are already assigned to at least one domain
DELETE_MODAL.UNABLE_DELETE_ALL_MIME: You are unable to delete those MIME Policies
DELETE_MODAL.UNABLE_DELETE_ONE_MIME: You are unable to delete this mime policy
DELETE_MODAL.UNABLE_DELETE_SOME_MIME: Some of MIME policies are deleted successfully but not others because you dont have permission to delete them

ASSIGN_MODAL.ASSIGN_MODAL_SUBTITLE: You are about to assign this mime policy for {currentDomain}. Do you want to proceed?

MIME_TYPE_TABLE.SEARCH: Search by name, extention or status

MIME_POLICIES.NAME: Name

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: To turn the functionality on or off and control nested domain admin access on the functionality activation
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Enable functionality
ACTIVATION_POLICY.OVERRIDE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow nested admin to override this section

CONFIGURATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether nested domain admin can change Parameter(s) section
CONFIGURATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow nested admin to change functionality parameter
CONFIGURATION_POLICY.OVERRIDE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow nested admin to override this section

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether user can change the default parameter provided by administrator
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change default value of parameter
DELEGATION_POLICY.OVERRIDE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow nested admin to override this section

ANONYMOUS_URL.NAME: Anonymous URL
ANONYMOUS_URL.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can share a file to an anonynous email

PARAMETER.TITLE: Secure sharing
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: This value will be used as initial value when users open sharing form. The sharing will be protected by an one time password. Even if you are able to retrieve the URL, without the password you won't be able to access to it.
PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: Secure anonymous shares with a password

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users when sharing can override the default value of secure sharing option
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change secure sharing option when sharing documents

ANONYMOUS_URL__FORCE_ANONYMOUS_SHARING.NAME: Force anonymous sharing process
ANONYMOUS_URL__FORCE_ANONYMOUS_SHARING.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can choose to share documents only via anonymous url.

PARAMETER.TITLE: Force anonymous share
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Even if you are sharing documents with other LinShare users, documents will be shared using an anonymous link.
PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: Force anonymous share for all recipients

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users when sharing documents can change the initial value of force anynomous url option

ANONYMOUS_URL__NOTIFICATION.NAME: Anonymous download notification
ANONYMOUS_URL__NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: If users share files to others. They will receive a mail notification when recipients download any files from anonymous url.

PARAMETER.TITLE: Notification sending frequency
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether to send notification for every downloads or only the first one

ANONYMOUS_URL__NOTIFICATION_URL.NAME: Email notification URL
ANONYMOUS_URL__NOTIFICATION_URL.DESCRIPTION: Provide base url for the share link of anonymous share

PARAMETER.TITLE: Base URL for the anonymous share link
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: This URL will appear in recipient's notification email when users in this domain share files via anonymous url

ANONYMOUS_URL__HIDE_RECEIVED_SHARE_MENU.DESCRIPTION: Received Share is a menu where users can see files others have shared with them. By enabling this functionality, users will not be able to access this menu.
ANONYMOUS_URL__HIDE_RECEIVED_SHARE_MENU.NAME: Hide Received Shares menu

UPLOAD_REQUEST.NAME: Upload request
UPLOAD_REQUEST.DESCRIPTION: Upload request is a feature through which a person (identified by email) can upload files for a LinShare user, in a temporary and regulated manner. The uploaded documents will take space in the issuer's personal space. When this functionality is disabled, the below sub-functions will not work.

PARAMETER.TITLE: Base URL of upload request portal
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Upload request recipient will manage their uploads from a separate portal. The URL to this portal is embedded in the notification emails sent by the server.

UPLOAD_REQUEST__LIMIT.NAME: Limit number of upload requests per user
UPLOAD_REQUEST__LIMIT.DESCRIPTION: Allows setting limitation of how many uploaded requests an user can create in this domain.

PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION_MAXIMUM: Maximum number of upload requests a user can create in this domain. Only requests with status of Pending/Active/Closed are counted.

UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_ACTIVATION.NAME: Delay before activation
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_ACTIVATION.DESCRIPTION: Determine the delay between upload request creation date and the activation date when upload request is available and users can upload files

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Allow a certain delay between creation date and activation date of upload requests. If disabled, upload requests will be activated upon creation
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow setting delay between activation date and creation date

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can change the initial activation date
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change activation date

PARAMETER.TITLE: Default delay to activate requests after creation date
PARAMETER.TITLE_MAXIMUM: Maximum delay to activate requests after creation date

UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_EXPIRATION.NAME: Delay before expiration
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: Determine the delay between upload request activation date and expiration date when upload request is closed, recipients can no longer upload files

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Allow a certain delay between activation date and expiration date of upload requests. If disabled, future upload requests will not be expired
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow setting delay between activation date and creation date

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can change the initial expiration date
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change expiration date

PARAMETER.TITLE: Default delay to expire requests after activation date
PARAMETER.TITLE_MAXIMUM: Maximum delay to expire requests after activation date

UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_COUNT.NAME: Maximum file count
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_COUNT.DESCRIPTION: Determine maximum number of files that a recipient can upload on an upload request

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Add a limit for number of files recipient can upload per request. If disabled, there will be no limit.
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow setting maximum number of files that a recipient can upload

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can change the initial maximum files number
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change maximum files number

PARAMETER.TITLE: Default number of files limit
PARAMETER.TITLE_MAXIMUM: Maximum number of files limit that issuer can set

UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_SIZE.NAME: Maximum file size
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_SIZE.DESCRIPTION: Determine maximum size of a file that a recipient can upload on an upload request

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Add a limit for file size that recipient can upload. If disabled, there will be no limit.
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow setting maximum file size

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can change the initial maximum files number
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change maximum files number

PARAMETER.TITLE: Default maximum file size
PARAMETER.TITLE_MAXIMUM: Maximum file size limit that issuer can set

UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_DEPOSIT_SIZE.NAME: Maximum deposit size
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_DEPOSIT_SIZE.DESCRIPTION: Determine maximum total storage size that a recipient can upload on an upload request

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Add a limit for total storage size that recipient can upload. If disabled, there will be no limit.
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow setting maximum total files size

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can change the initial total files size
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change total files siz

UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROTECTED_BY_PASSWORD.NAME: Protected by password URL
UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROTECTED_BY_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Upon sending requests to recipients, a password will be attached to the invitation email. This password will be the inital password when recipients enter the portal as they have to change the password for future access

PARAMETER.TITLE: Allow upload request to be protected by a password
PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: Upload requests are protected by default

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can override the default value of password protected option
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change password protected option

UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_CLOSE.NAME: Closure right
UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_CLOSE.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether request issuer or request recipients can close upload request before its expiration date

PARAMETER.TITLE: Allow closure
PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to close requests by default

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can override the default value of allow closure option
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change allow closure option

UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_DELETE.NAME: Allow repcipients to delete files
UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_DELETE.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether upload request recipients can delete uploaded files

PARAMETER.TITLE: Allow deletion
PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: Allow recipients to delete uploaded files by default

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can override the default value of allow deletion option
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change allow deletion option

UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_NOTIFICATIO.NAME: Delay before notification
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_NOTIFICATIO.DESCRIPTION: Send a notification to remind recipient to upload file.

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Allow LinShare to send reminder notifications or determine the delay of sending notification before request expiration
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow LinShare to send reminder notifications

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can change the initial notification date
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change notification date

PARAMETER.TITLE: Default delay to send notification before request is expired
PARAMETER.TITLE_MAXIMUM: Maximum delay to send notification before request is expired
PARAMETER.UNLIMITED_CHECKBOX: No limit except for current date

UNDOWNLOADED_SHARED_DOCUMENTS_ALERT.NAME: Undownloaded shared document alert
UNDOWNLOADED_SHARED_DOCUMENTS_ALERT.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users will be notified when a shared document has not been downloaded. Notification will not be sent if at least one file of the share has been downloaded.

PARAMETER.TITLE: Undownloaded document alert
PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: Allow notifications to be sent by default

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can override the default value of Undownloaded Document Alert option
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change Undownloaded Document Alert option

UNDOWNLOADED_SHARED_DOCUMENTS_ALERT__DUR.NAME: Days before the alert
UNDOWNLOADED_SHARED_DOCUMENTS_ALERT__DUR.DESCRIPTION: Determine the number of work days (weekends and holidays are excluded) between sharing date and the alert notification date

PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Determine the default notification date when user ticks Undownloaded Document Alert option in sharing form
PARAMETER.TITLE: Default number of days after sharing that notification is sent

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can override the default notification date
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change notification date

SHARE_EXPIRATION.NAME: Share expiration
SHARE_EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether a share can be expired or not

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Allow a share to be expired and determine the expiration date
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow a share to be expired

PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Determine period before a share is expired
PARAMETER.TITLE: Default period before a shared is expired
PARAMETER.TITLE_MAXIMUM: Longest period before a shared is expired

SHARE_EXPIRATION__DELETE_FILE_ON_EXPIRAT.NAME: Deleting files on expiration shares
SHARE_EXPIRATION__DELETE_FILE_ON_EXPIRAT.DESCRIPTION: Shared files will be removed from user's space at the expiration

PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether shared files will be removed when the share is expired
PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: Remove the shared file on expiration

SHARE_CREATION_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_FOR_OWNER.NAME: Acknowledgement of share creation
SHARE_CREATION_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_FOR_OWNER.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users would receive email notification when they share files in LinShare

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Allow acknowledgement of share creation and determine the default option
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow acknowledgement of share creation

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can override the default value of Sharing Acknowledgement option
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to turn on/off Sharing Acknowledgement

PARAMETER.TITLE: Default value Sharing Acknowledgement when users create a share

SHARED_SPACE.NAME: Shared space
SHARED_SPACE.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows users to access Shared Space. Shared Space contains Workspaces and standalone Workgroups. A Workspace contains members with their roles and nested Workgroups. A Workgroup contains members with their roles and content (folders/files/versions).

SHARED_SPACE__WORKSPACE_LIMIT.NAME: Limit number of workspaces
SHARED_SPACE__WORKSPACE_LIMIT.DESCRIPTION: Allows setting limitation on number of workspace that an user can create in this domain

PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION_MAXIMUM: Max number of workspaces that an user can create in this domain

SHARED_SPACE__NESTED_WORKGROUPS_LIMIT.NAME: Limit number of nested workgroups
SHARED_SPACE__NESTED_WORKGROUPS_LIMIT.DESCRIPTION: Allows setting limitation on number of nested workgroups that an user can create inside a workspace in this domain

PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION_MAXIMUM: Maximum number of nested workgroups that an user can create inside a workspace in this domain

WORK_GROUP__CREATION_RIGHT.NAME: Workgroup creation
WORK_GROUP__CREATION_RIGHT.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can create workgroups

ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to create workgroups

WORK_SPACE__CREATION_RIGHT.NAME: Workspace creation
WORK_SPACE__CREATION_RIGHT.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can create workspaces

ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to create workspaces

WORK_GROUP__DOWNLOAD_ARCHIVE.NAME: Archive download
WORK_GROUP__DOWNLOAD_ARCHIVE.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can download content of a folder in an archive file

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Allow archive download of folders in a workgroup
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow archive download

PARAMETER.TITLE_MAXIMUM: Maximum size for an archive download

WORK_GROUP__FILE_VERSIONING.NAME: File versioning
WORK_GROUP__FILE_VERSIONING.DESCRIPTION: Use file versioning feature in workgroups

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Allow file versioning option in a workgroup
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow file versioning

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can turn on/off file versioning feature on their workgorups
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to turn on/off file versioning

PARAMETER.TITLE: Default state of file versioning feature on new workgroups
PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: Enable file versioning for new workgroups

MIME_TYPE.NAME: Mime type
MIME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether to apply configured Mime type policy to the current domain

JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN.NAME: JWT permanent token
JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN.DESCRIPTION: Enable authentication using JWT permanent token and Tokens management page in user interface

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Allow authentication using permanent token and token management
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow creation and using JWT permanent token for authentication

PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: Domain administrators can create JWT token for users in domain

INTERNAL_ENABLE_PERSONAL_SPACE.NAME: Enable personal space for internal users
INTERNAL_ENABLE_PERSONAL_SPACE.DESCRIPTION: Allow users access to their My Space where users can upload files and share with others

PARAMETER.TITLE: When a new users are created, they can use My Space or not
PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: Allow access to My Space for new users

GUESTS.NAME: Guests
GUESTS.DESCRIPTION: External emails not registered to LinShare can be invited by internal users as guests. A guest can use every features of LinShare as an internal user, except that guest will be expired after a configurable period of time.

ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to create and manage guests

GUESTS__EXPIRATION.NAME: Expiration
GUESTS__EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: Determine the expiration date of guest accounts

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can change expiration date of their created guest accounts
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change guest's expiration date

PARAMETER.TITLE: Default expiration date
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Time period between creation date and default expirationd date
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION_MAXIMUM: Longest time period that user can set between creation date and expiration date

GUESTS__CAN_UPLOAD.NAME: Allow access to My Space
GUESTS__CAN_UPLOAD.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether guests have access to My Space page or not

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can change My Space settings when creating guests
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change My Space settings

PARAMETER.TITLE: Default My Space settings
PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: Allow guests access to My Space

GUESTS__RESTRICTED.NAME: Contact restriction
GUESTS__RESTRICTED.DESCRIPTION: When creating a new guest, user can restrict guest files sharing only to a list of emails. By default, the guest will be restricted to his creator

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Upon creating a new guest, show an option of Restrict contact list in advanced section
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow contact restriction

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can change contact restriction settings when creating guests
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to change contact restriction settings

PARAMETER.TITLE: Default settings for contact restriction
PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: Allow contract restriction to a list of emails

GUESTS__EXPIRATION_ALLOW_PROLONGATION.NAME: Postpone guest expiry date
GUESTS__EXPIRATION_ALLOW_PROLONGATION.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can edit and postpone the expiration date of guests

ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to edit and postpone guest's expiration date

DOMAIN__MAIL.NAME: Domain mail
DOMAIN__MAIL.DESCRIPTION: Setting of the notification email of current domain. This email will be the sender address for any notifications.

DOMAIN__NOTIFICATION_URL.NAME: Notification URL
DOMAIN__NOTIFICATION_URL.DESCRIPTION: Setting of LinShare URL that will be used for the header of notification emails

CONTACTS_LIST.NAME: Contacts list
CONTACTS_LIST.DESCRIPTION: A contacts list can be used as recipient for many LinShare feature like files sharing, upload request,... Public contact lists are available to all domain users, while private lists can only be used by their creator

CONTACTS_LIST__CREATION_RIGHT.NAME: Creation right
CONTACTS_LIST__CREATION_RIGHT.DESCRIPTION: Determine whether users can create new contacts list

ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow users to create new contacts list

COMPLETION.NAME: Autocompletion
COMPLETION.DESCRIPTION: Determine number of characters that will trigger autocompletion search when users enter share recipient

PARAMETER.TITLE: Number of input characters to trigger autocompletion search

ANTIVIRUS.NAME: Antivirus
ANTIVIRUS.DESCRIPTION: When user uploads a file in LinShare, itwill be scanned before uploading to server. In order to use this functionalit, you need to configure IP and port of ClamAV in linshare.properties file. Server restart is required.

COLLECTED_EMAILS_EXPIRATION.NAME: Collected emails expiration
COLLECTED_EMAILS_EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: When user share files to new recipients (internal/external emails or guest), these emails are then collected and suggested on future shares. This functionality will decides whether those emails are expired or not

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Decides whether collected emails will be expired
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow collected emails to be expired

DOCUMENT_EXPIRATION.NAME: Document expiration
DOCUMENT_EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: Set an expiration date on new uploaded or duplicated files in user's space. When expired, files will be automatically removed. If users share a document, its expiration will be removed and then reapplied on share expiration.

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Decides whether new files will be expired
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allow newly uploaded files to expired

PARAMETER.TITLE: Retention period of newly uploaded files

SECOND_FACTOR_AUTHENTICATION.NAME: Second factor authentication
SECOND_FACTOR_AUTHENTICATION.DESCRIPTION: Log in process will be added by another step of authentication by OTP

ACTIVATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Allows user to setup second factor authentication in user interface
ACTIVATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allows user to setup second factor authentication

DELEGATION_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Allows user to remove second factor authentication
DELEGATION_POLICY.ENABLE_CHECKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Allows user to remove shared key of second factor authentication

PARAMETER.TITLE: Force all users to setup second factor authentication
PARAMETER.BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION: All users must setup second factor authentication

REPORTING.INTRODUCTION: Showing vairous statistics on your LinShare

FILTERS_MODAL.TITLE: Filters setting
FILTERS_MODAL.DOMAIN_SELECT_PLACEHOLDER: Select domains to filter, leave blank to select all domains

GENERICS.TITLE: Overall statistics
GENERICS.DESCRIPTION: Details of interaction records on multiple resources in LinShare

FILES_QUANTITY.TITLE: Quantity of files
FILES_QUANTITY.DESCRIPTION: Record changes on quantity of files

STORAGE_CONSUMPTION.TITLE: Storage consumption
STORAGE_CONSUMPTION.DESCRIPTION: Record changes on storage consumped by users

SUMMARY.TITLE: Summary
SUMMARY.DESCRIPTION: Calculate on storage that you are managing

TOTAL_STORAGE.TITLE: Total storage
TOTAL_STORAGE.DESCRIPTION: Calculate on storage that you are managing

MOST_UPLOADED.TITLE: Most uploaded files
MOST_UPLOADED.DESCRIPTION: Calculate on storage that you are managing

USER_USED_STORAGE.TITLE: User & Storage statistic
USER_USED_STORAGE.DESCRIPTION: Showing top 100 users/shared  spaces with largest used storage

CONFIGURATION.YOU_NEED_TO_CHOOSE_ONE_DOMAIN: You need to choose one domain by the button below before start make any changes on its setting

CONFIGURATION_PAGE.MAIL_LAYOUT_DESCRIPTION: “Mail layout” allow to create a custom mail layout.
CONFIGURATION_PAGE.MAIL_FOOTER_DESCRIPTION: “Mail footer” to edit the mail footer template.
CONFIGURATION_PAGE.MAIL_CONTENT_DESCRIPTION: “Mail content” to manage mail notification content, sent to LinShare users.
CONFIGURATION_PAGE.MAIL_ASSIGN_DESCRIPTION: After creating then adjust a mail template, you can assign this mail template for the domain or its nested domains.

EMAIL_LAYOUT.SECOND_HELP_TEXT: image LinShare log, that can be set in the configuration (If you have the required authorities)
EMAIL_LAYOUT.THIRD_HELP_TEXT: personalMessage A custom message added to the default message body
EMAIL_LAYOUT.FIVE_HELP_TEXT: body Content that you put in 'Mail content'
EMAIL_LAYOUT.SIX_HELP_TEXT: footer Content that you put in 'Mail footer'

ASSIGN_MODAL.ASSIGN_MODAL_SUBTITLE: You are about to assign this mail configuration for {currentDomain}. Do you want to proceed?

DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_MODAL_SUBTITLE: You are about to delete this mail configuration for {currentDomain}. Do you want to proceed?
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_ASSIGNED: Selected mail configuration is associated with at least one domain. You cannot delete
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_UNAUTHORIZED: You do not have the rights to delete this mail configuration
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_SELECTED_MAIL_CONFIGURATION_SUBTI: You are about to delete {qty} mail configurations, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_ASSIGNED_SOME: Some of mail configuration are deleted successfully but not others because they are already assigned to at least one domain
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_UNAUTHORIZED_SOME: Some of mail configuration are deleted successfully but not others because you do not have the rights to delete them
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_UNAUTHORIZED_ALL: You do not have the rights to delete those mail configurations
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_ASSIGNED_ALL: You are unable to delete those mail configurations
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_ONE: You are unable to delete this mail configuration
DELETE_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_ALL: You are unable to delete those mail configurations

DELETE_LAYOUT_MODAL.DELETE_MODAL_SUBTITLE: You are about to delete this mail layout for {currentDomain}. Do you want to proceed?
DELETE_LAYOUT_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_ASSIGNED: Selected mail layout is associated with at least one domain. You cannot delete
DELETE_LAYOUT_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_UNAUTHORIZED: You do not have the rights to delete this mail layout
DELETE_LAYOUT_MODAL.DELETE_SELECTED_MAIL_CONFIGURATION_SUBTI: You are about to delete {qty} mail layouts, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?
DELETE_LAYOUT_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_ASSIGNED_SOME: Some of mail layout are deleted successfully but not others because they are already assigned to at least one domain
DELETE_LAYOUT_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_UNAUTHORIZED_SOME: Some of mail layout are deleted successfully but not others because you do not have the rights to delete them
DELETE_LAYOUT_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_UNAUTHORIZED_ALL: You do not have the rights to delete those mail layouts
DELETE_LAYOUT_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_ASSIGNED_ALL: You are unable to delete those mail layouts
DELETE_LAYOUT_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_ONE: You are unable to delete this mail layout
DELETE_LAYOUT_MODAL.DELETE_ERROR_ALL: You are unable to delete those mail layouts

MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.FILE_WARN_OWNER_BEFORE_FILE_EXPIRY: A file is about to be deleted since it will reach its expiry date
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_ACCOUNT_NEW_CREATION: A new guest receives an activation link for his account
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_ACCOUNT_RESET_PASSWORD_LINK: A guest receives a reset link for his password
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_WARN_GUEST_ABOUT_HIS_PASSWORD_RESE: A guest account password was modified
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_WARN_OWNER_ABOUT_GUEST_EXPIRATION: A guest's account will expire soon
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_ACCOUNT_RESET_PASSWORD_FOR_4_0: Change guest password due to security enhancement
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_FILE_DOWNLOAD: A recipient has downloaded the file share
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_FILE_SHARE_DELETED: A sender has deleted his file share
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_NEW_SHARE_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_FOR_SEND: The sender receives a recap of his file shares
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_NEW_SHARE_FOR_RECIPIENT: A recipient receives a file share link
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_WARN_RECIPIENT_BEFORE_EXPIRY: The file share of the sender is about to expire
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_WARN_SENDER_ABOUT_SHARE_EXPIRATION: A share will expire soon without being downloaded
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_WARN_RECIPIENT_ABOUT_EXPIRED_SHARE: The share has expired and was deleted by the system
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_ANONYMOUS_RESET_PASSWORD: The password of the anonymous share was reset
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_CREATOR: The issuer has closed the upload request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_RECIPIENT: A recipient has closed the upload request of the creator
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELETED_BY_RECIPIENT: A recepient has deleted a file within the upload request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELETED_BY_OWNER: A file was deleted by the issuer of the Upload Request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_UNAVAILABLE_SPACE: A recipient could not upload his file due to insufficient space
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_UPLOADED_FILE: A recipient has uploaded a file within the upload request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_BEFORE_EXPIRY: An upload request is about to be closed
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_EXPIRY: An upload request has been closed
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_ACTIVATED_FOR_OWNER: An upload request has been activated for the issuer
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_ACTIVATED_FOR_RECIPIENT: An upload request has been activated for the recipient
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_OWNER: The upload request has been closed by the issuer
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CREATED: An upload request has been created
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELTED_BY_OWNER: The upload request issuer deletes a file within the upload request.
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_PASSWORD_RENEWAL: The password of the upload request was renewed
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_PASSWORD_REMOVED: The password of the upload request was deleted
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_REMINDER: Remind the recipient of the upload request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_UPDATED_SETTINGS: The settings related to upload request was updated
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_RECIPIENT_REMOVED: A given contact in the Upload Request was removed
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_NEW_MEMBER: A user has been added to the workgroup
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER: The rights of a member on the workGroup has been updated
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER: A member was removed from the workGroup
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARN_JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN_C: A user receives a notification when an administrator creates a permanent access token (JWT) for his account
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARN_JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN_D: A user receives a notification when an administrator deletes a permanent access token (JWT) for his account
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.DRIVE_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER: A member was removed from the DRIVE
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.DRIVE_WARN_NEW_MEMBER: A user has been added to the DRIVE
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.DRIVE_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER: The rights of a member on the DRIVE has been updated
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORK_SPACE_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER: A member was removed from the Workspace
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORK_SPACE_WARN_NEW_MEMBER: A user has been added to the Workspace
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORK_SPACE_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER: The rights of a member on the Workspace has been updated
